reviews.name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my adult son. He loved it. Only thing wrong, the band was way too big for him. He said he was sure the store would remove some of the links to fit him. Hope he's right!
reviews.title: great gift

reviews.name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
reviews.reviewText: Lots of good features. Not too bulky looking. My husband loves it.
reviews.title: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch

reviews.name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for, good looking, easy set up instructions, good quality, great price, good display & features. Its not a rolex but then again neither am I. Glad I found it online at good old Walmart.
reviews.title: Great watch for the money.

reviews.name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable band, Plenty of features, all around great watch.
reviews.title: Great Watch

reviews.name: Casio Men's Digital Sport Watch
reviews.reviewText: I am a nurse RN and needed an economic wrist watch for work only so that I don't have to use my expensive ones in the hospital. This watch is perfect: economic, light, and good looking. Time and date which are very important. If it is kind of big for your wrist, no problem, Walmart will adjust it to fit your wrist better free of cost at the jewerly counter. Battery is supposed to lat 10 years. And it looks very nice more expensive thatn wht it is.
reviews.title: Excellent for work
